CustomField.description: If true and Task Time Entry Mode is Current, the View or Edit Details links shown when hovering over a timecard line are hidden. If true and Task Time Entry Mode is not Current, the Notes tab is hidden on the links. The default value is false.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If true and Task Time Entry Mode is Current, the View or Edit Details links shown when hovering over a timecard line are hidden. If true and Task Time Entry Mode is not Current, the Notes tab is hidden on the links. The default value is false
CustomField.label: Hide View Edit Details Link
